lines.text: Your niece is certainly the most beautiful patient I have ever had.

The Creation of human Beings by Alchemistry has been accomplished by means of this formula. These Ingredients must be kept at a Temperature of 115 Degrees fahrenheit; to them add the heart Blood of a Maiden. After this is done the first Signs of Life will be observed.
He looks as if he had stepped out of a melodrama.
The man has a horned viper - the deadliest of all snakes.
If you wish to see strange things I have the power to show them to you.
In selecting the Subject for obtaining this heart Blood, a Maiden of fair Skin, golden hair, Eyes that are blue or grey is essential.
I have never been Haddo's wife... We are married in name only!
Night... and the lights of the Sorcerer's tower gleaming through the storm like two evil eyes.
